availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas H. Richardson (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mariah L. Richardson. Father of E. Richardson, Clancy Richardson, Samuel Richardson, Susan M. Richardson, and Mary E. Richardson. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 267B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts, p. 596. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 5, p. 435A. Find A Grave, "Thomas H. Richardson (1818-1874)," Memorial #112414433, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112414433 (accessed June 22, 2017).
